TEXT.TITLE: TELEQUEST <TELQ.O> CHAIRMAN RESIGNS
TEXT.BODY:
Telequest Inc said Henry Marcheschi, its chairman and president, resigned for health reasons. Executive vice president Robert Lee was elected president and chief executive to succeed Marcheschi, the company said.
Reuter
